pages.text: This upgrade is an interesting one. Although the chance is very small, you can increase the amount of your crafting results.$(br2)$(italic)More bang for your buck!

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Place on top your $(l:general/pedestal)Pigment Pedestals$(/l) Gemstone Blocks or the Chiseled Blocks of your $(l:general/fusion_shrine)Fusion Shrine$(/l). Additional ones have a decreased effect.

pages.title: Tier 2
pages.text: This upgraded version is much more potent, allowing you to get even more output for your crafting.
